author: fabiocos
body: This PR is the backport into the base CMSSW_9_4_X branch of the additions in the CMSSW_9_4_MAOD_X branch used to build the CMSSW_9_4_9_cand1 build, to be used for the validation of the code for the reminiAOD 2016.
title: Merge CMSSW_9_4_9_cand1 content into 9_4_X (for reminiAOD 2016 reprocessing)
